overview: Go backstage with some of the hardest rockers in heavy metal with this collection of in-depth interviews featuring members of My Dying Bride, Cannibal Corpse, King Diamond, Immortal, S.O.D., Nevermore, Peter Steele and other top performers. These hard-driving rockers share surprising insights on music, their inspirations, life on the road and other topics with Bill Zebub & The Grimoire of Exalted Deeds.
title: Metal Interviews: Grimoire Style
